argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_subrgrcl | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Grp ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> R e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_subrgss | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> A C_ ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R |`s A ) = ( R |`s A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_subrgring | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( ( R |`s A ) e. Ring -> ( R |`s A ) e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> ( R |`s A ) e. Grp ) |
| 10 | 4 | #P_issubg | |- ( A e. ( SubGrp ` R ) <-> ( R e. Grp /\ A C_ ( Base ` R ) /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 5, 9, 10 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> A e. ( SubGrp ` R ) ) |
